III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
Physical Description of Facility
The facility is a single-family home located in Gaines, MI. It is a ranch style home
with two floors. The bedroom, kitchen, living areas and bathrooms are located on
the first floor. The staff office space and recreational area is located in the finished
basement area. It is a multi-room facility with six bedrooms. Each room is
appropriately equipped with one twin bed and other amenities to meet the needs of
female teens. The facility has four bathrooms for the use of residents and one staff
restroom. The facility has a large kitchen area with sufficient dining seating for the
residents and a spacious living room area that is properly equipped with seating for
all. The facility also has a large den area on the first floor that has been comfortably
styled for use as a therapy room. It is equipped with appropriate literature for
therapeutic intervention, comfortable seating and excellent lighting. The basement
of the facility is where the staff office space, the security room and recreational
space is located. An environmental inspection was completed on 07/11/2022 with
an A rating. A fire safety inspection was completed on 07/21/2022 with an A rating.
Program Description
Mission Ranch is an agency that was established with a mission to provide a stable
living environment for commercially sexually exploited female youth which includes
therapeutic intervention, education and life skills development offering the youth an
opportunity to become healthy and productive members of the community.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
The facility has currently provided proposed compliance with all child welfare
licensing rules that apply to their programming. The CA has agreed to add or
amend proposed compliance if upon opening the program, it is determined there is a
need.
IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on substantial compliance with the rules, it is recommended that a six
month original license be issued.
